description: This file defines an Angular component named ProductListComponent responsible for displaying, filtering, paginating, and managing products in a product list page of an e-commerce furniture shop. It handles fetching product data from a ProductService, applies user-driven filters, navigates to product details, and manages cart and wishlist actions.

classes.name: ProductListComponent
classes.description: Angular component for listing, filtering, and managing products in the product list page.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes the component and triggers initial fetch of product data.

methods.name: fetch
methods.description: Fetches the list of products from the ProductService based on current filters and pagination.

methods.name: applyFilters
methods.description: Resets to the first page and fetches products based on current filter criteria.

methods.name: clearFilters
methods.description: Resets all filter fields to default empty or null and refetches the product list.

methods.name: prevPage
methods.description: Navigates to the previous page if exists.

methods.name: nextPage
methods.description: Navigates to the next page if exists.

methods.name: openDetail
methods.description: Navigates to the detailed view of a selected product.

methods.name: addToCart
methods.description: Adds a product to the cart and updates cart count in the application.

methods.name: addToWishlist
methods.description: Adds a product to the wishlist.

ctags.name: g
ctags.pattern: /^        const g = typeof globalThis !== "undefined" ? (globalThis as any) : undefined;$/

ctags.name: rootApp
ctags.pattern: /^        const rootApp = g?.['rootAppComponent'] as AppComponent | undefined;$/
